sentences.en: Does this house belong to Mr. Winter?
sentences.cn: 这幢房子是温特先生的 吗 ?

sentences.en: He belongs to the golf club.
sentences.cn: 他是高尔夫球俱乐部的成员。

sentences.en: He did not belong to his set of friends.
sentences.cn: 他与他那伙朋友不一样.

sentences.en: Hunting dogs belong in the country, not in the city.
sentences.cn: 猎犬宜养在乡间, 不宜养在城市.

sentences.en: I belong to the school of thought that favors radical change.
I really think that we belong together.
sentences.cn: 我真的觉得我们属于彼此。

sentences.en: I'm so glad to see you back where you belong.
sentences.cn: 我真高兴看到你又回到了属于你自己的天地。

sentences.en: Put the chair back where it belongs.
The British and Dutch belong to the same race.
sentences.cn: 英国人和荷兰人是同一种族.

sentences.en: The house had belonged to her family for three or four generations.
sentences.cn: 这座房子属于她家已有三四代了。

sentences.en: They belong to an older, more self-denying generation.
sentences.cn: 他们属于更加克己的上一代人。

sentences.en: They need to feel they belong.
To this class of substance belong mica, porcelain, quartz, glass, wood, etc.
sentences.cn: 属于这类物质的有云母 、 瓷器 、 石英 、 玻璃 、 木材等等.

sentences.en: We belong perpetually to each other for life or for death.
sentences.cn: 我们永远相依为命,同生死,共患难.

sentences.en: We belong to the new club.
sentences.cn: 我们是这个新俱乐部的成员.

sentences.en: Wheat, maize and oats belong to the grain group.
sentences.cn: 小麦, 玉米及燕麦都属谷类.

words.tran_cn: 属于，应归入；居住；适宜；应被放置

trans.tran_cn: 属于，应在（某处），适合，适应
trans.tran_en: If something belongs to you, you own it

trans.tran_cn: 属于， 是…的成员； 归属于； 应被放置， 应归入； 适合， 合得来
trans.tran_en: If something belongs to you, you own it
